vsParam: Huh? Ryza, what's going on? You look troubled...
I like alchemy because I think it can broaden my path.

Yes. I said it before. I grew up in the countryside,
and my life was boring.

But when I came to know alchemy,
heehee, it has suddenly broadened my horizons.
Alchemy has changed my boring life.
So I want to become a good alchemist.
Heehee. That's nice! Uh? But why are you troubled?
To be honest, my alchemical skills are... very poor!
... Look, there are many alchemists in this Academy, right?
Yes. [px] is quite impressive, not to mention the teachers...
And the alchemists from other worlds are good too.

Right? Compared with them, I'm still very unimpressive.
And my trouble is how to improve myself.
Oh. I see. But being anxious wouldn't help, would it?
You can't be good at alchemy in days. It takes solid efforts...
Yeah. That being said, is there any way to do it quickly...

Ha ha... I get what you mean, Ryza.
You're motivated to learn alchemy.
Ryza, if you want to be good at alchemy...

Hmm... Did you take the course called the
"Bergamot's Course on Alchemy Cultivation"?

"Bergamot's Course on Alchemy Cultivation"?
I didn't know there was such a course.
To master alchemy, heehee, I'll pay undivided attention in class.
Er. I have a bad feeling... Ryza, it may not be a good idea.

Start from the ingredient gathering marathon!
Fetch the ingredients in Albus.

Then comes the hellish synthesis training.
You need to mix all the ingredients you gather.
And, keep making items day in and day out. And then...
Hmm. Bergamot Sensei? This is too harsh. Don't you think?
What? Ryza, don't you want to master alchemy quickly?
So that means no breaks! Start training yourself from the beginning!

Ah! Right! I just remembered. I have to do something!
Ah. Ha ha ha! I, I got to go!
Ah. She ran away. Gee. Bergamot Sensei is mean~
I've never heard of the "Bergamot's Course on Alchemy Cultivation".
Hehe. Of course. I was just thinking.

As you said, Peppermint, no one can master alchemy in
days. There's no shortcut.
But I know that Ryza is quite gifted.

It would be a great waste if she doesn't treasure her talents.
She just needs more practice.

Ha ha ha. You should have told her that just now.
Yeah. Ryza can do it, right?

Of course. I'm sure Ryza will make it one day.
She'll realize her dream and become a qualified alchemist.
